title: "FREE ZAUN ICON" Missing on my Zaun webpage

replies.body:
You may be running a browser configuration or addon (extension) that is conflicting with the page. I'd recommend trying another browser or device to access the webpage so we can see if this is the case.

Let me know if this caused a noticeable change for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ERn6azdw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-01T04:45:40.036+0000)
>
> You may be running a browser configuration or addon (extension) that is conflicting with the page. I'd recommend trying another browser or device to access the webpage so we can see if this is the case.
> 
> Let me know if this caused a noticeable change for you.

No change =(
EDIT: I could see the greyed out version of it before it was avaliable and the rest of the champs lores were updated, but once it was avaliable i couldn't see it anymore.
Which devices have you tried and were they all connected to the same network?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ERn6azdw,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-02T23:13:56.436+0000)
>
> Which devices have you tried and were they all connected to the same network?

Ended up trying a computer at my job that ended up working ^^
I clicked the redeem button but i have yet to recieve my icon

The icons are getting sent out over time, so you may not see them instantly show up on your account. If you don't have it by the 16th, hit us up in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
